ROOT.dsUNDW: select e.name,e.owner from sg_db.sg_sys_ua_user_b u join sg_db.sg_org_employee_b e on u.user_employee_id=e.id where u.user_name='{0}'
ROOT.dsDWN: select name from sg_db.sg_con_pwrgrid_b where id='{0}'
ROOT.dsSelectDW: select id,name from sg_db.sg_con_pwrgrid_b order by name
ROOT.dsBusBar: select id,busname from ( select bus.id,sub.name||v.name||bus.name busname from sg_db.sg_dev_busbar_b bus join sg_db.sg_con_commonsubstation_b sub on bus.st_id = sub.id join sg_db.sg_dic_voltagetype v on bus.voltage_type =v.code where bus.owner='990100' order by busname) union select deviceid id,devicename busname from ys_db.ysh_ts_event_happen where devicetype='母线'
ROOT.dsLine: select id,linename from ( select id,name as linename from sg_db.sg_dev_acline_b where owner='990100' order by name) union select deviceid id,devicename linename from ys_db.ysh_ts_event_happen where devicetype='线路'
ROOT.dsTransform: select id,transfname from ( select tf.id as id,sub.name||tf.name transfname from sg_db.sg_dev_pwrtransfm_b tf join sg_db.sg_con_commonsubstation_b sub on tf.st_id = sub.id where tf.owner='990100' order by transfname ) union select deviceid id,devicename transfname from ys_db.ysh_ts_event_happen where devicetype='变压器'
ROOT.dsOther: select deviceid,devicename from ys_db.ysh_ts_event_happen where devicetype='其他'
ROOT.ds100: select id,h.deptid,h.deptname,h.deviceid,h.devicename,devicetype,event,content,affect,h.reporter,h.checker,eventtime, s.happenid,s.solvetime,s.resulttime,s.endtime,s.solution,s.result,s.reporter,s.checker from ys_db.ysh_ts_event_happen h left join ys_db.ysh_ts_event_solve s on h.id = s.happenid where h.id = {0}
ROOT.dsIsExists: select count(*) from ys_db.ysh_ts_event_solve where happenid={0}
